definitions.definition: Distant from the lives and everyday concerns of ordinary people; esoteric, exclusive, select.
definitions.example: Philosophical debates can be quite rarefied.

definitions.definition: Elevated in style or nature, sublime; of high intellectual or moral value.
(of a gas etc.) Less dense than usual; thin.
definitions.example: The air at high altitudes at the top of mountains is rarefied.

definitions.definition: To make rare, thin, porous, or less dense
To expand or enlarge without adding any new portion of matter to.
